column1: canon powershot g3[+3]##i recently purchased the canon powershot g3 and am extremely satisfied with the purchase .
use[+2]##the camera is very easy to use , in fact on a recent trip this past week i was asked to take a picture of a vacationing elderly group .
picture[+2]##they fired away and the picture turned out quite nicely . ( as all of my pictures have thusfar ) .
picture quality[+1]##a few of my work constituants owned the g2 and highly recommended the canon for picture quality .
picture quality[+1]##i 'm easily enlarging pictures to 8 1/2 x 11 with no visable loss in picture quality and not even using the best possible setting as yet ( super fine ) .
camera[+2], use[+2], feature[+1]##bottom line , well made camera , easy to use , very flexible and powerful features to include the ability to use external flash and lense / filters choices .

picture quality[+3], use[+1], option[+1]##i 'd highly recommend this camera for anyone who is looking for excellent quality pictures and a combination of ease of use and the flexibility to get advanced with many options to adjust if you like .
camera[+2]##this is my first digital camera , and what a ' toy ' it is !

picture[+2]##just a little overview , powershot g3 is the flagship of canon 's powershot series and its an slr-like camera , its 4 megapixel and ( alsmost ) full manual control gives the pictures a touch of brilliance .
use[+1]##whether you are a novice or an expert , its ease of use and functionality goes together .
dial[-1]##* main dial is not backlit .
viewfinder[-2]##* lens visible in optical viewfinder .
camera[+2][p]##overall i 'm happy with my toy .
camera[+3]##in a word , " awesome " is how i would describe this camera .

speed[+2],picture quality[+2],function[+2]##i wo n't go into the details here , as the online sites ( stevesdigicams , dpreviews ) go into great depth in their reviews , but i am very pleased with the features , the speed , the picture quality , the flexibility , the automation , and the functional conveniences this camera offers .
auto setting[+2]##with the automatic settings , i really have n't taken a bad picture yet .
camera[+3]##i am absolutely in awe of this camera , canon put enormous quality into the g3 .
canon g3[+3]##i bought my canon g3 about a month ago and i have to say i am very satisfied .
photo quality[+2]##i have taken hundreds of photos with it and i continue to be amazed by their quality .
feature[+2]##the g3 is loaded with many useful features , and unlike many smaller digital cameras , it is easy to hold steady when using slower shutter speeds .
viewfinder[-1]##the lens is visible in the viewfinder when the lens is set to the wide angle , but since i use the lcd most of the time , this is not really much of a bother to me .
camera[+2]##despite this minor disappointment , i highly recommend the canon g3 anyone who is serious about digital photography .
camera[+2]##i have only had this camera for one full day and i have to say that it is wonderful .
photo quality[+3]##the photo quality is amazing and i know i 'm going to have fun with all the features .

darn diopter adjustment dial[-1]##the reason i rated it a four is because of that darn diopter adjustment dial. its very small and hard to turn so you can 't get an accurate adjustment ( for those of you who do n't know what a diopter adjustment is , it is to adjust the focus of the viewfinder to your eyesight . )

exposure control[+2],auto setting[+2]##1 ) slr like programming and exposure control gives you latitude to be creative , yet its progam and auto exposure settings provide excellent photos if you do n't want to bother with the settings .
metering option[+2]##excellent range of metering options as well .
spot metering[+1]##it 's great to switch to spot metering and actually see it working on the lcd screen .
4mp[+1]##2 ) 4mp is about right for the target market of this camera ( semi-serious amateur photographer )
zoom[+1]##3 ) 4x zoom is nice
focus[+2]##5 ) its focusing system is also very flexible .

focus[+2]##you can move the focus range to almost anywhere in the scene with the push of a button , and it has an on-screen manual focus mode that would be really helpful if shooting a scene that is tough to automatically focus .

size[-2][u],weight[-2][u]##1 ) quite bulky ( it 's about the same size as my minolta vectis s-1 aps slr ) and uses a heavy battery , although not very solid as it is contructed mostly of plastic ( unlike canon 's elph line )
design[-2][u]##2 ) not very ergonomical - you 'll find even for a point-and-shoot lens )
viewfinder[-2]##4 ) the viewfinder is borderuer lcd scoying .
feature[+2], ##the camera has a wonderful set of features .
lcd[+2]##the lcd screen pulls out and rotates in any direction for easy pictures .
optical zoom[+2],digital zoom[+1]##the optical zoom works great and the 14x digital zoom is a very nice addition although pictures at the highest digital zoom are a little blurry .
picture[+3]##the highest optical zoom pictures are perfect .
picture[+3]##i have not yet seen any of the usual problems with digital pictures ( purple fringing , etc ) so i am very pleased .
software[+2]##the canon computer software used to download , sort , upload and manage your digital pictures on the computer is very nice and very easy to use .

lens cap[-1],viewfinder[-1]##the only two minor issues i have with the camera are the lens cap ( it is not very snug and can come off too easily ) and the lens itself ( it partially obstructs the view through the viewfinder but not views through the lcd ) .
menu[+1],button[+1]##the menus are easy to navigate and the buttons are easy to use .
camera[+3]##it is a fantastic camera and well worth the price .
camera[+3]##recent price drops have made the g3 the best bargain in digital cameras currently available .
control[+2]##advanced photobugs will find more creative control than imaginable .
auto setting[+2]##newbies will find the full auto setting will give them perfect pictures right out of the box .
photo quality[+3]##4 megapixels is enough for anybody and the photo quality is awesome .
use[+2][u]##those used to 35mm cameras will find the g3 very comfortable and friendly to use .
zoom[+2],lense[+2]##the extended zoom range and faster lense put it at the top of it 's class .
camera[+3]##i recommend unreservedly the powershot g3 to any potential buyer looking for a first-class digital camera at a reasonable price - there is no better camera out there - period !

picture[+3], control[+2], battery[+2], software[+2]##it gives great pictures , the controls are easy to use , the battery lasts forever on one single charge , the software is very user-friendly and it is beautiful in it chrome casing .
photo quality[+2], auto mode[+2]##i began taking pics as soon as i got this camera and am amazed at the quality of photos i have took simply by using the auto mode .
canera[+2]##this camera has canon 's great colorimetry , plus what you see in the lcd is what you get .
print[+2]##the prints are beautiful !

battery[+1]##although canon 's batteries are proprietary , they last a really long time , recharge fairly quickly in the camera , plus if you want ' more power ' , you can even find a knockoff charger and spare batteries right here on amazon .
camera[+2]##this is a great camera for you !
control[+2],auto mode[+2]##the canon g3 gives tons of control for photo buffs but still has an " auto " mode that makes it very easy for the novice to use .
control[+2]##i love having the option to manually control the f-stop , shutter speed and even focus .
photo[+3]##i was able to take great photos of the 4th of july fire works , and got some amazing shots of the kids playing with sparklers .
control[+2]##but if you 've used a slr 35mm camera , the controls are very intuitive !

dial[+1]##with a quick spin of the dial you can select shutter priority ( for high speed subjects ) , aperture priority ( for focal length ) or full program mode where the camera selects both for ideal photo quality .
manual mode[+2]##the manual mode is easy to use with fast access for the selection of shutter speed and aperture without having to fumble through menu options .
feel[+2],weight[+2]##this camera also has a great feel and weight to it .
feel[+2]##you feel like you are holding something of substance , not some cheap plastic toy .
camera[+2][p]##the more i work with it , the more i love it !
camera[+3][u]##i did n't think i would find this quality and ease of use for under $ 1500 - i 'm thrilled with my purchase !
camera[+3]##this is my first digital camera , and i am very pleased with it .
camera[+2][u]##seriously , this thing has everything that a pro or expert amateur could want .
picture[+2], auto mode[+2]##but at the same time , it takes wonderful pictures very easily in " auto " mode , so that even an average joe like me can use it !
four megapixel[+1]##four megapixels is great .
product[+3][u]##it is a very amazing product .
camera[+3][p]##i highly recommend it .
feature[+2]##just received this camera two days ago and already love the features it has .
photo[+2]##takes excellent photos .
night mode[+2]##night mode is clear as day .
use[+1][u]##i have not played with all the features yet , but the camera is easy to use once you get used to it .
viewfinder[-1]##the only drawback is the viewfinder is slightly blocked by the lens .
camera[+3]##overall it is the best camera on the market .

picture quality[+3]##a ) the picture quality ( color and sharpness of focusing ) are so great , it completely eliminated my doubt about digital imaging --- how could one eat rice one grain at a time : - ) )
lens cover[-2]##b ) the lens cover is surely loose , i already accidently finger-printed the len a few times , and au lens tigt and cause potential damage .
zooming lever[-2]##the zooming lever is shaky , i hope it does not operate mechanically , otherwise you 'll feel uneasy .
camera[+2]##i love this camera .
picture[+2]##took hundreds of pictures and they were great .
color[+2],picture[+2],white balance[+2]##great colors , pictures and white balance .
optical zoom[+1]##has 4x optical zoom which is higher than any other in the same price range .
picture[-3][u]##maybe it is my lack of experience , but i found shots with this camera very disappointing .
price[-3][u]##it was ( i sold it after a few months ) too expensive for the shots that i got .
camera[-2][u]##sure it had all the features , but when i tried to shoot a girl 's basketball game it just wan't up to the task .
camera[-3]##i found that low light situations combined with any sort of action left this camera in the dust .
grain[-3]##the grain was terrible .
flash photo[-3],noise[-2]##well flash photos are never great , and there was still a lot of noise .
photo[+3]##when i took outdoor photos with plenty of light and the objects were n't moving , the photos were awesome .
camera[+1]##the camera was a marvel .
camera[+3][p]##it is versatile and seems to be one of the best .
g3[+1]##i chose the g3 because of its reputation for very high quality , clean images .

lag time[-2],flash[-2]##the two limitations i knew i would have to deal with are the very long lag time before it focus-locks ( even in bright light ) , and the unsatisfactory light quality of the built-in flash .
depth[+1]##what makes the focus-lock lag time something i can live with is the extreme depth of field obtainable with these point and shoot digicams at f8 .
flash[-2]##relative to what i can easily achieve with external flash on my nikon slr , the internal flash on the g3 produces harsh , flat images with ugly hot spots .

external flash hot shoe[+1]##fortunately , the g3 has a hot shoe that can take an external flash , and fortunately for me , i already owned a one of the highest quality external flashes that money can buy : the metz 60 ct-4 .
flash[+2]##contrary to what ive read elsewhere , the g3 does sync at 1/250 of a second with third-party flashes , just as it does with the dedicated flashes from canon .

software[-2]##now there is one more complaint i have about the g3 and that is the software that comes with it for processing raw images ( i only shoot in raw image mode and the first thing i did was replace the 32 mbyte cf with a 512 mbyte cf , which gives me 130 raw images , as opposed to 7 !
software[-2]##the canon software for raw images does not present you with a raw image at all , but the raw image after it has been processed by all the image-affecting settings in the camera .
g3[+3]##what this plug-in reveals is the truly stunning quality of the raw g3 hardware .
color[+3]##without any tweaking at all , if the exposure is accurate , the colors are as realistic as ive ever seen produced by film , and this is a raw image !
g3[+3],software[-2]##the adobe camera raw plug-in shows once again that hardware is miles ahead of software .
software[-2]##what the g3 raw image software gives you is a fantasy world designed to please the uncritical .
image[+3]##but at least youre starting with the most photorealistic images ive ever seen from a camera .

raw image[+3]##i am stunned and amazed at the quality of the raw images i am getting from this g3 ( in conjunction with my professional flash system ) , and can easily put up with the cameras limitations , because ive never seen anything better within its resolution limits .
camera[+2][p]##i 've had this for 3 months now , and i am pleased with my decision .
camera[+3]##this is the perfect camera for a photo hobbiest who wants to have easy point and shoot ability as well .
battery life[+1]##battery life , the drawback to most digital cameras , to quote k. reeves .
manual function[+2],picture quality[+3]##manual functionality is excellent , downloading pictures is quick and a breeze , and the quality is astounding .

viewfinder[-1],lcd[+2],camera[+3]##not perfect ( yes , the viewfinder can get obstructed in instances.but the lcd works well enough in those instances ) , not the cheapest 4.0 mp , but the best 4.0 mp .
service[+3]##the service from the supplier was exceptional .
photo[+3]##having used it for more than a month , i can say that it consistently produces topnotch photos .
photo[+3]##by cocking the shutter to the halfway position and getting the settings ready to shoot , i was able to produce excellent stopaction photos -- contrary to what other reviewers experienced .
automode[+2],manual mode[+2]##the camera is a dream to operate in automode , but also gives tremendous flexibility in aperture priority , shutter priority , and manual modes .
viewfinder[-2]##about the only legitimate criticsm from the online reviews is that fact that the lens really does obstruct the viewfinder .
camera[+3]##i can 't write enough positive things about this great little camera !
canon[+3]##but canon never fails to amaze .
raw format[+2]##1 . the ability to selectively switch to raw format during record review gives you incredible more post-processing flexibility .
battery life[+1]##2 . battery life is over 4.5 hours , compared to about 2.5 hours for the g2 or the 2 hours for most nikons .
software[+2]##3 . the remote capture and fileviewer software bundled for photo capture is mind-blowing .
shape[+1]##4 . the shape of this device is a little squarer , without losing the weight which means better balance and less shaking while clicking .
light auto correction[+2]##the light auto-correction is awesome .
picture[+2]##you could take a picture of a stone glinting in the sun and still avoid the shining glaze and get the contours right .

white offset[+2]##8 . perhaps inspired by the canon 's factory white-correction settings ( which were found lacking and had to be altered by a user before the white edges from buildings etc could be cleaned out ) , the g3 has much sharper white offsets .
g3[+3]##overall , the g3 delivers what must be considered the best image quality of any current > 4 megapixel digicams , from a detail , tonal balance and color response point of view .
camera[+3][p]##this is quite simply the best you can ask for .
low light focus[-2]##the g3 had problems focusing in low light and would not take the picture when the shutter was pressed but after the shutter had been released a few seconds .

photo[+3], use[+3], software[+2]##4mp , 4x optical zoom , takes absolutely beautiful photos with detail that challenges all of the above 5mp cameras , easy to understand and use ( has a great swivel lcd screen ) , a lot of features and add-on options , comes with great software ( not to be overlooked ) , and last but by far not least , received my fiance 's stamp of approval ( two thumbs up ! )

distortion[-1][u]##yes there is a corner lens barrel distortion ( i do n't like it too but no harm done since i always use the camea lcd screen to see exactly what i 'm going to get ) in the viewfinder when you do n't zoom ( when you zoom the lens distortion goes away ) , canon knows this and engineered it that way to minimize the parallax phenomenon ; that is what lmost exactly ot the picture .

viewfinder[-2]##to address two previous somewhat negative reviews : ( 1 ) yes , the lens barrel does obstruct part of the lower left corner in the lens viewfinder ; however , the lcd viewfinder is rather stunning and i find myself rarely using the lens viewfinder .

manual[+1]##i have yet to try using all of the adjustment options : shutter priority , aperature priority , light metering adjustments , etc. , but all controls are well thought out and and the manual is relatively clear .
